list.name: 更改
list.comment:
feat: Implement JWT authentication and exception handling
- Created JwtAuthenticationTokenFilter extending OncePerRequestFilter for login authentication - Allows login requests to bypass authentication, otherwise performs identity verification and stores verification information in SecurityContextHolder
- Implemented exception handling for authentication and authorization failures - AuthenticationEntryPointImpl and AccessDeniedHandlerImpl handle authentication and authorization exceptions respectively - Configured these exception handlers in ScurityConfig to encapsulate response returns
- Implemented GlobalExceptionHandler for unified exception handling - Wraps responses uniformly when exceptions occur in the application, ensuring clients receive a consistent error response

task.summary:
feat: Initialize baseBlog
- Set up project structure and configuration files - Install necessary dependencies - Implement basic server setup - Create initial API endpoint for testing

feat: Implement CORS handling and hot articles API
- Added CORS middleware to handle cross-origin requests - Implemented API endpoint for fetching hot articles - Tested and verified the functionality

refactor: Optimize SystemConstants, HotArticleVo, and BeanCopyUtils
- Refactored SystemConstants to handle literal values - Optimized HotArticleVo processing - Encapsulated utility functions in BeanCopyUtils

refactor: Optimize SystemConstants, HotArticleVo, and BeanCopyUtils
- Refactored SystemConstants to handle literal values - Optimized HotArticleVo processing - Encapsulated utility functions in BeanCopyUtils

feat: Implement categoryList and articleList APIs
- Added categoryList API to query category list - Implemented articleList API to query articles under a category
feat: Create PageVo, ArticleListVo, CategoryVo entities
- Created PageVo, ArticleListVo, and CategoryVo entities to represent data structures
feat: Configure MybatisConfig for pagination query interceptor
- Added MybatisConfig configuration class to set up pagination query interceptor

feat: Implement Link, User entities and related services
- Added LinkVo, UserInfoVo, BlogUserLoginVo, LoginUser, Link, User entities - Implemented FastJsonRedisSerializer for Redis serialization - Created RedisConfig as the Bean configuration class for Redis - Configured WebConfig for CROS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) resolution - Implemented UserMapper, LinkMapper, UserService, LinkService - Implemented LinkServiceImpl, UserDetailsServiceImpl, BlogLoginServiceImpl
feat: Implement link query and authentication
- Implemented query functionality for links (Link entity) - Implemented authentication using Spring Security - UserDetailsServiceImpl handles UserDetailsService operations in DAO - BlogLoginServiceImpl performs specific login authentication, retrieving UserDetails from Authentication

feat: Implement JWT authentication and exception handling
- Created JwtAuthenticationTokenFilter extending OncePerRequestFilter for login authentication - Allows login requests to bypass authentication, otherwise performs identity verification and stores verification information in SecurityContextHolder
- Implemented exception handling for authentication and authorization failures - AuthenticationEntryPointImpl and AccessDeniedHandlerImpl handle authentication and authorization exceptions respectively - Configured these exception handlers in ScurityConfig to encapsulate response returns
- Implemented GlobalExceptionHandler for unified exception handling - Wraps responses uniformly when exceptions occur in the application, ensuring clients receive a consistent error response

feat: Initialize baseBlog
- Set up project structure and configuration files - Install necessary dependencies - Implement basic server setup - Create initial API endpoint for testing

feat: Implement CORS handling and hot articles API
- Added CORS middleware to handle cross-origin requests - Implemented API endpoint for fetching hot articles - Tested and verified the functionality

refactor: Optimize SystemConstants, HotArticleVo, and BeanCopyUtils
- Refactored SystemConstants to handle literal values - Optimized HotArticleVo processing - Encapsulated utility functions in BeanCopyUtils

feat: Implement categoryList and articleList APIs
- Added categoryList API to query category list - Implemented articleList API to query articles under a category
feat: Create PageVo, ArticleListVo, CategoryVo entities
- Created PageVo, ArticleListVo, and CategoryVo entities to represent data structures
feat: Configure MybatisConfig for pagination query interceptor
- Added MybatisConfig configuration class to set up pagination query interceptor

feat: Implement Link, User entities and related services
- Added LinkVo, UserInfoVo, BlogUserLoginVo, LoginUser, Link, User entities - Implemented FastJsonRedisSerializer for Redis serialization - Created RedisConfig as the Bean configuration class for Redis - Configured WebConfig for CROS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) resolution - Implemented UserMapper, LinkMapper, UserService, LinkService - Implemented LinkServiceImpl, UserDetailsServiceImpl, BlogLoginServiceImpl
feat: Implement link query and authentication
- Implemented query functionality for links (Link entity) - Implemented authentication using Spring Security - UserDetailsServiceImpl handles UserDetailsService operations in DAO - BlogLoginServiceImpl performs specific login authentication, retrieving UserDetails from Authentication

feat: Implement JWT authentication and exception handling
- Created JwtAuthenticationTokenFilter extending OncePerRequestFilter for login authentication - Allows login requests to bypass authentication, otherwise performs identity verification and stores verification information in SecurityContextHolder
- Implemented exception handling for authentication and authorization failures - AuthenticationEntryPointImpl and AccessDeniedHandlerImpl handle authentication and authorization exceptions respectively - Configured these exception handlers in ScurityConfig to encapsulate response returns
- Implemented GlobalExceptionHandler for unified exception handling - Wraps responses uniformly when exceptions occur in the application, ensuring clients receive a consistent error response
